content: This move is powerful, as is the equipped effect, which increases the damage of any Heavy Attack that takes 3 or more Focus Points. Heavy Attacks that cost that many Focus Points are already strong, so to have them boosted even more is a great effect.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Turtle_Treasure_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Turtle Treasure Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Turtle Treasure Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
This move is powerful, as is the equipped effect, which increases the damage of any Heavy Attack that takes 3 or more Focus Points. Heavy Attacks that cost that many Focus Points are already strong, so to have them boosted even more is a great effect.
